content: princes street cowl materials 200 400 yards magpie swanky worsted short version 1 skein empty night long version 2 skeins hell s bells gauge 16sts = 4 abbreviations needles k knit us size 9 5 5mm 16 circular short p purl us size 9 5 5mm 24 circular long notions stitch marker tapestry needle www magpiefibers com all images text and illustration © magpie fibers 2015 instructions cast on 92 200 stitches join and place marker for working in the round *k2 p2* repeat to end of round repeat for 3 rounds for a total of 4 rounds body pattern round 1 and 2 *p2 k2* round 3 and 4 *k2 p2* repeat this 4 round pattern 15 times repeat round 1 and 2 one more time finishing *k2 p2* repeat to end of round repeat for 3 rounds for a total of 4 rounds bind off loosely and weave in ends block www magpiefibers com all images text and illustration © magpie fibers 2015
